id: 15 Reasons You Shouldn't Bother With Voting This Year
paragraph:
Every vote counts? Psh, yeah right.
        The First Vote by A.R. WaudOur right to vote is sacred. It's the foundation of our democracy. You can find out how to register to vote at http://t.co/8kaqY0U3fn.BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
